name: Gluttonous Leviathan
text:
This spell costs {4} less to cast if a player has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
Flood {1}{u}{b} (During your turn, you may pay {1}{u}{b} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”) 
When you flood Gluttonous Leviathan, each player mills two cards.
